SELECT B_SEQ, ADMIN_ID, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_READ_CNT, B_IMGNAME, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B_SEQ, ADMIN_ID, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_READ_CNT, B_IMGNAME, REG_DATE FROM(SELECT A.B_SEQ, NVL(A.ADMIN_ID,'') AS ADMIN_ID, NVL(B.ADM_NAME,'') AS ADM_NAME, NVL(A.B_TITLE,'') AS B_TITLE, NVL(A.B_CONTENT,'') AS B_CONTENT, NVL(A.B_READ_CNT,'') AS B_READ_CNT, NVL(A.B_IMGNAME,'') AS B_IMGNAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM WD_EBOARD A, WD_ADMIN B WHERE A.ADMIN_ID = B.ADMIN_ID
AND A.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.B_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.B_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(A.B_SEQ) AS CNT FROM WD_EBOARD A, WD_ADMIN B WHERE A.ADMIN_ID = B.ADMIN_ID
AND A.B_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.B_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT A.B_SEQ, NVL(A.ADMIN_ID,'') AS ADMIN_ID, NVL(B.ADM_NAME,'') AS ADM_NAME, NVL(A.B_TITLE,'') AS B_TITLE, NVL(A.B_CONTENT,'') AS B_CONTENT, NVL(A.B_READ_CNT,'') AS B_READ_CNT, NVL(A.B_IMGNAME,'') AS B_IMGNAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS REG_DATE FROM WD_EBOARD A, WD_ADMIN B WHERE A.B_SEQ = #{value} AND A.ADMIN_ID = B.ADMIN_ID
